original_text: any one episode of the sopranos would send this ill-conceived folly to sleep with the fishes .
generated_text:
1. "This film is a snooze fest, even a single scene from The Godfather would put it to sleep."
2. "I'd rather watch paint dry than sit through another minute of this cinematic abomination."
